Key.English: Yes
Key.German: Ja
Key.French: Oui
Key.Italian: Si
Key.Portuguese: Sim

Key.English: No
Key.German: Nein
Key.French: Aucun
Key.Italian: No
Key.Portuguese: Não

Key.English: Cancel
Key.German: Abbrechen
Key.French: Annulée
Key.Italian: Annulla
Key.Portuguese: Cancelar

Key.Original: You will receive your next paycheck in %1 minutes
Key.English: You will receive your next paycheck in %1 minutes
Key.German: Du erhältst deinen nächsten Gehaltsscheck in %1 Minuten
Key.French: Vous recevrez votre prochain chèque de paie dans %1 minutes
Key.Italian: Riceverai il tuo prossimo stipendio in %1 minuti
Key.Portuguese: Você vai receber seu próximo pagamento em %1 minutos

Key.Original: You have missed a paycheck because you were dead.
Key.English: You have missed a paycheck because you were dead.
Key.German: Du erhältst kein Gehaltsscheck, da du gestorben bist.
Key.French: Vous avez manqué un chèque de paie parce que vous étiez mort.
Key.Italian: Hai perso uno stipendio perche eri morto.
Key.Portuguese: Você não recebeu seu pagamento pois estava morto.

Key.Original: You have received a paycheck of $%1
Key.English: You have received a paycheck of $%1
Key.German: Du hast deinen Gehaltscheck in Höhe von $%1 erhalten
Key.French: Vous avez reçu un salaire de $%1
Key.Italian: Hai ricevuto uno stipendio di €%1
Key.Portuguese: Você recebeu seu pagamento de R$%1

Key.Original: Du kannst nicht mehr als $999,999 auf einmal transferieren.
Error saving container, couldn't locate house?
Key.English: Error saving container, couldn't locate house?
Key.German: Fehler beim Speichern der Container, es konnte kein Haus gefunden werden?
Key.French: Erreur lors de la sauvegarde des conteneur, impossible de localiser la maison.
Key.Italian: Errore nel salvataggio del contenitore, impossibile trovare la casa?
Key.Portuguese: Erro ao salvar a caixa, não foi possível encontrar a casa.

Key.Original: You are not allowed to access this storage container without the owner opening it.
Key.English: You are not allowed to access this storage container without the owner opening it.
Key.German: Du bist nicht berechtigt, auf diesen Container zuzugreifen, ohne dass der Besitzer ihn aufgeschlossen hat.
Key.French: Vous n'êtes pas autorisé à accéder à ce conteneur de stockage sans que le propriétaire ne l'ouvre.
Key.Italian: Non sei autorizzato ad accedere a questo contentitore senza il permesso del proprietario.
Key.Portuguese: Você so pode acessar a caixa se o dono deixar ela aberta.

Key.English: You have unlocked the door.
Key.German: Du hast die Tür aufgeschlossen.
Key.French: Vous avez ouvert la porte.
Key.Italian: Hai sbloccato la porta.
Key.Portuguese: Você destrancou a porta.

Key.English: You have locked the door.
Key.German: Du hast die Tür abgeschlossen.
Key.French: Vous avez verrouillé la porte.
Key.Italian: Hai bloccato la porta.
Key.Portuguese: VocÊ trancou a porta.

Key.Original: You are not near a door!
Key.English: You are not near a door!
Key.German: Keine Tür in der Nähe!
Key.French: Vous n'êtes pas près d'une porte!
Key.Italian: Non sei vicino ad una porta!
Key.Portuguese: Você não está perto de uma porta!

Key.Original: This house was recently sold and is still processing in the database.
Key.English: This house was recently sold and is still processing in the database.
Key.German: Dieses Haus wurde vor Kurzem verkauft.
Key.French: Cette maison a été récemment vendu et est en cours de traitement dans la base de données.
Key.Italian: Questa casa è stata venduta di recente ed il database la sta ancora processando.
Key.Portuguese: Essa casa já foi vendida, estamos processando a ordem de compra

Key.Original: You do not have a home owners license!
Key.English: You do not have a home owners license!
Key.German: Du hast keine Eigentumsurkunde!
Key.French: Vous n'avez pas de permis de propriétaires de maison!
Key.Italian: Non hai la licenza per il possesso delle case!
Key.Portuguese: Você não tem um Registro Civil para comprar casas!

Key.Original: You can only own %1 houses at a time. (As a Donator, you can buy 5 houses.)
Key.English: You can only own %1 houses at a time.
Key.German: Du darfst nur %1 Häuser zugleich besitzen.
Key.French: Vous ne pouvez posséder que %1 maisons à la fois.
Key.Italian: Puoi possedere solo %1 case
Key.Portuguese: Você só pode ter uma casa!

Key.Original: Auch als Donator kannst du nicht mehr als 5 Häuser haben. Lass den anderen ruhig auch etwas übrig.
You do not have enough money!
Key.English: You do not have enough money!
Key.German: Du hast nicht genug Geld!
Key.French: Vous n'avez pas assez d'argent!
Key.Italian: Non hai fondi a sufficienza!
Key.Portuguese: Você não tem todo esse dinheiro!

Key.Original:
This house is available for $%1
It supports up to %2 storage containers
Key.English:
This house is available for $%1
It supports up to %2 storage containers
Key.German:
Dieses Haus gibt es für $%1
Es unterstützt %2 Lagerbox(en)
Key.French:
Cette maison est disponible pour $%1
Il prend en charge jusqu'à %2 conteneurs de stockage
Key.Italian:
Questa casa è disponibile per $%1
Può supportare fino a %2 contenitori
Key.Portuguese:
Essa casa está disponível por R$%1
Ela suporta até %2 caixa(s)

Key.English: Purchase House
Key.German: Haus kaufen
Key.French: Acheter la Maison
Key.Italian: Compra Casa
Key.Portuguese: Comprar Casa

Key.Original: This house doesn't belong to anyone.
Key.English: This house doesn't belong to anyone.
Key.German: Dieses Haus gehört niemandem.
Key.French: Cette maison n'appartient à personne.
Key.Italian: Questa casa non appartiene a nessuno.
Key.Portuguese: Essa casa não tem dono.

Key.Original: This person is not online there for you cannot raid their house!
Key.English: This person is not online there for you cannot raid their house!
Key.German: Der Hausbesitzer ist nicht online, daher kannst du sein Haus nicht stürmen!
Key.French: Cette personne n'est pas en ligne, vous ne pouvez pas perquisitionner cette maison!
Key.Italian: Questa persona non è online quindi non puoi perquisire la sua casa!
Key.Portuguese: O dono da casa não está online, você não pode vasculhar a casa!

Key.English: The door is already unlocked!
Key.German: Die Tür ist bereits offen!
Key.French: La porte est déjà débloqué!
Key.Italian: La porta è già sbloccata!
Key.Portuguese: A porta está destrancada!

Key.English: Breaking lock on door
Key.German: Türschloss wird aufgebrochen
Key.French: En train de casser la sérrure
Key.Italian: Sbloccando la porta
Key.Portuguese: Quebrando a fechadura da porta

Key.Original: %1 your house is being raided by the cops!
Key.English: %1 your house is being raided by the cops!
Key.German: %1 dein Haus wird von der Polizei durchsucht!
Key.French: %1 votre maison est perquisitionnée par les flics!
Key.Italian: %1 la Polizia si sta introducendo in casa tua!
Key.Portuguese: %1 Sua casa está sendo vasculhada pela Policia!

Key.English: House Owner
Key.German: Hauseigentümer
Key.French: Propriétaire
Key.Italian: Proprietario Casa
Key.Portuguese: Proprietário

Key.Original: There is nothing in this house.
Key.English: There is nothing in this house.
Key.German: Es gibt nichts in diesem Haus.
Key.French: Il n'y a rien dans cette maison
Key.Italian: In questa casa non c'è nulla.
Key.Portuguese: Essa casa está vazia.

Key.English: Searching House...
Key.German: Haus wird durchsucht...
Key.French: Recherche Maison...
Key.Italian: Perquisendo la Casa...
Key.Portuguese: Vasculhando a casa...

Key.Original: You went too far away from the house!
Key.English: You went too far away from the house!
Key.German: Du hast dich zu weit vom Haus entfernt!
Key.French: Vous êtes parti trop loin de la maison!
Key.Italian: Sei andato troppo distante dalla casa!
Key.Portuguese: Você está muito distante da casa!

Key.Original: A house was raided and had $%1 worth of drugs / contraband.
Key.English: A house was raided and had $%1 worth of drugs / contraband.
Key.German: Ein Haus wurde durchsucht und es wurden Drogen / Schmuggelware im Wert von $% gefunden.
Key.French: Une maison a été perquisitionné et a $%1 de drogue / contrebande.
Key.Italian: Una casa è stata perquisita e sono stati trovati €%1 in materiali illegali.
Key.Portuguese: A casa assaltada tem R$%1 em drogas ou contrabandos.

Key.English: Nothing illegal in this house.
Key.German: Nichts Illegales in diesem Haus.
Key.French: Rien d'illégal dans cette maison
Key.Italian: Questa casa non contiene nulla d'illegale.
Key.Portuguese: Nada ilegal nessa casa.

Key.English: House storage unlocked
Key.German: Lagerplatz des Hauses geöffnet
Key.French: Stockage de la maison déverrouillé
Key.Italian: Contenitori della casa sbloccati
Key.Portuguese: Armário da casa destrancado

Key.English: House storage locked
Key.German: Lagerplatz des Hauses geschlossen
Key.French: Stockage de Maison verrouillé
Key.Italian: Contenitori della casa bloccati
Key.Portuguese: Armário da casa trancado

Key.English: Locking up house please wait...
Key.German: Haus wird abgeschlosen, bitte warten...
Key.French: Fermeture de la maison veuiller patienter...
Key.Italian: Bloccando la casa, attendere prego...
Key.Portuguese: Trancando a casa, aguarde...

Key.English: House has been locked up.
Key.German: Haus wurde abgeschlossen.
Key.Italian: La casa è stata bloccata.
Key.Portuguese: Sua casa foi trancada!

Key.Original: Are you sure you want to sell your house? It will sell for: <t color='#8cff9b'>$%1</t>
Key.English: Are you sure you want to sell your house? It will sell for: <t color='#8cff9b'>$%1</t>.
Key.German: Bist Du sicher, dass du dein Haus verkaufen möchtest? Es wird für <t color='#8cff9b'>$%1</t> verkauft
Key.French: Etes-vous sûr de vouloir vendre votre maison? Elle se vendra pour: <t color='#8cff9b'>$%1</t>
Key.Italian: Sei sicuro di voler vendere la tua casa? La venderai per: <t color='#8cff9b'>€1</t>
Key.Portuguese: Você tem certeza que deseja vender a casa? O valor de venda é: <t color='#8cff9b'>R$%1</t>

Key.Original: Du bist derzeit in keiner Gang. Was willst du machen?
Du hast nicht die $%1 um auszuparken.
Vehikel wird aus der Garage geholt...
Sorry but %1 was classified as a destroyed vehicle and was sent tot he scrap yard.
Sorry but %1 is already active somewhere in the world and cannot be spawned.
Du kannst dein Vehikel nicht ausparken, da dort bereits etwas steht.
Du hast dein Vehikel für $%1 verkauft.
Dieses Vehikel wurde gemietet und kann daher nicht eingelagert werden.
Das Vehikel hier gehört dir nicht. Du kannst es nicht einlagern.
You must create a gang first before capturing it!
Key.English: You must create a gang first before capturing it!
Key.German: Du musst erst in einer Gang sein, um einzunehmen zu können!
Key.French: Vous devez créer un gang avant de le capturer!
Key.Italian: Devi creare una gang prima di catturarla!
Key.Portuguese: Você precisa criar uma gangue antes de tentar capturar esse esconderijo!

Key.Original: Your gang already has control over this hideout!
Key.English: Your gang already has control over this hideout!
Key.German: Deine Gang hat bereits die Kontrolle über dieses Versteck!
Key.French: Votre bande a déjà le contrôle de cette cachette!
Key.Italian: La tua Gang ha già il controllo di questo Covo
Key.Portuguese: Sua gangue já tem controle sobre esse esconderijo!

Key.Original: Only one person shall capture at once!
Key.English: Only one person shall capture at once!
Key.German: Nur eine Person kann das Versteck einnehmen!
Key.French: Une seule personne doit capturer à la fois!
Key.Italian: Può conquistare solo una persona alla volta!
Key.Portuguese: Somente uma pessoa pode capturar!

Key.Original:
This hideout is controlled by %1.

Are you sure you want to take over their gang area?
Key.English:
This hideout is controlled by %1.

Are you sure you want to take over their gang area?
Key.German:
Das Versteck wird durch %1 kontrolliert.

Bist du sicher, dass du ihr Gang Gebiet übernehmen möchtest?
Key.French:
Cette cachette est contrôlée par %1.

Etes-vous sûr que vous voulez prendre en charge leur zone de gang?
Key.Italian:
Questo Covo è controllato da %1.

Sicuro di voler prendere il controllo della loro area?
Key.Portuguese:
Esse esconderijo é controlado por %1.

Você tem certeza que deseja tomar essa área?

Key.English: Hideout is currently under control...
Key.German: Versteck ist derzeit unter Kontrolle...
Key.French: La cachette est actuellement sous contrôle ...
Key.Italian: Il Covo è già sotto controllo...
Key.Portuguese: Esconderijo sobre controle....

Key.English: Capturing cancelled
Key.German: Einnehmen abgebrochen
Key.French: Capture annulée
Key.Italian: Cattura annullata
Key.Portuguese: Ação concelada

Key.English: Capturing Hideout
Key.German: Versteck einnehmen
Key.French: Capture cachette
Key.Italian: Catturando il Covo
Key.Portuguese: Capturando Esconderijo

Key.Original: %1 and his gang: %2 - have taken control of a local hideout!
Key.English: %1 and his gang: %2 - have taken control of a local hideout!
Key.German: %1 und seine Gang: 2% - haben die Kontrolle über ein lokales Versteck übernommen!
Key.French: %1 et sa gang: %2 ont pris le controle de la cachette !
Key.Italian: %1 e la sua Gang: % 2 - hanno preso il controllo di un Covo!
Key.Portuguese: %1 e sua gangue: %2 - agora tem o controle de um esconderijo!

Key.Original: You can't have a gang name longer then 32 characters.
Key.English: You can't have a gang name longer then 32 characters.
Key.German: Dein Gang Name kann nicht länger als 32 Zeichen sein.
Key.French: Vous ne pouvez pas avoir un nom de gang de plus de 32 caractères.
Key.Italian: %1 e la sua Gang: % 2 - hanno preso il controllo di un Covo!
Key.Portuguese: O nome de sua gangue não pode ter mais de 32 caracteres.

Key.Original: You have invalid characters in your gang name. It can only consist of Numbers and letters with an underscore
Key.English: You have invalid characters in your gang name. It can only consist of Numbers and letters with an underscore
Key.German: Du hast ein ungültiges Zeichen in deinem Gang Namen. Der Name darf nur aus Zahlen und Buchstaben sowie einem Unterstrich bestehen
Key.French: Vous avez des caractères non valides dans le nom de votre gang. Il ne peut être constitué de chiffres amd lettres avec un trait de soulignement
Key.Italian: Hai inserito caratteri non validi nel nome della Gang. Puoi inserire solo numeri e lettere con un underscore
Key.Portuguese: O nome da sua gangue tem caracteres inválidos. O nome so pode conter caracteres e números separados por sublinhado

Key.Original: You do not have enough money in your bank account.\n\nYou lack: $%1
Key.English: You do not have enough money in your bank account.\n\nYou lack: $%1
Key.German: Du hast nicht genug Geld auf deinem Bankkonto.\n\nDir fehlen: $%1
Key.French: Vous n'avez pas assez d'argent dans votre compte bancaire.\n\nVous manquez de: $%1
Key.Italian: Non hai abbastanza fondi nel tuo conto in banca.\n\nTi mancano: €%1
Key.Portuguese: Você não tem dinheiro suficiente na sua conta bancária.\n\nFaltam: R$%1

Key.Original: You have created the gang %1 for $%2
Key.English: You have created the gang %1 for $%2
Key.German: Du hast die Gang %1 für $%2 erstellt
Key.French: Vous avez créé la bande %1 pour $%2
Key.Italian: Hai creato la Gang %1 al costo di €%2
Key.Portuguese: Você criou a gangue %1 por R$%2

Key.Original:
You are about to disband the gang, by disbanding the gang it will be removed from the database and the group will be dropped.

Are you sure you want to disband the group? You will not be refunded the price for creating it.
Key.English:
You are about to disband the gang, by disbanding the gang it will be removed from the database and the group will be dropped.

Are you sure you want to disband the group? You will not be refunded the price for creating it.
Key.German:
Du bist dabei, die Gang aufzulösen. Durch Auflösung der Gang wird sie aus der Datenbank entfernt.

Bist du sicher, dass du die Gang auflösen willst? Du erhältst den Preis für die Erstellung nicht zurück.
Key.French:
Vous vous apprêtez à dissoudre le gang, en démantelant le gang, il sera supprimé de la base de données et le groupe sera supprimé.

Etes-vous sûr de vouloir dissoudre le groupe? Vous ne serez pas remboursé le prix de sa création
Key.Italian:
Stai per sciogliere la Gang, facendolo sarà rimossa dal Database e il gruppo verrà cancellato.

Sei sicuro di voler sciogliere il gruppo? Non verrai rimborsato dei fondi spesi per crearlo.
Key.Portuguese:
Você vai desfazer a sua gangue, ela será apagada do banco de dados.

Você tem certeza que quer desfazer a gangue? Você não será reembolsado.

Key.English: Disbanding the gang...
Key.German: Gang wird aufgelöst...
Key.French: Démantèlement du gang ...
Key.Italian: Sciogliendo la Gang...
Key.Portuguese: Desfazendo gangue...

Key.English: Disbanding cancelled
Key.German: Auflösung abgebrochen
Key.French: Démantèlement annulé
Key.Italian: Scioglimento annullato
Key.Portuguese: Cancelar ação de desfazer gangue

Key.Original: The leader has disbanded the gang.
Key.English: Disbanding cancelled
Key.German: Der Anführer hat die Gang aufgelöst.
Key.French: Le chef a démantelé le gang.
Key.Italian: Il Capo ha sciolto la Gang
Key.Portuguese: O lider da gangue desfez a gangue.

Key.Original:
%1 has invited you to a gang called %2
If you accept the invitation you will be a part of their gang and will have access to the gang funds and controlled gang hideouts.
Key.English:
%1 has invited you to a gang called %2
If you accept the invitation you will be a part of their gang and will have access to the gang funds and controlled gang hideouts.
Key.German:
%1 hat dich zu einer Gang namens %2 eingeladen
Wenn Du die Einladung annimmst, wirst du ein Teil der Gang und bekommst Zugang zu den Gang-Konten und kontrollierten Gang Verstecken.
Key.French:
%1 vous a invité à un gang appelé %2
Si vous acceptez l'invitation que vous serez une partie de leur gang et aurez accès à des fonds de gangs et des cachettes de gangs contrôlés.
Key.Italian:
%1 ti ha invitato nella Gang: %2
Se vuoi accettarai l'invito entrerai a far parte della loro Gang ed avrai accesso ai loro fondi e ai loro Covi.
Key.Portuguese:
%1 convidou você para a gangue %2
Se você aceitar você terá acesso aos recursos da gangue e os esconderijos.

Key.Original: You are about to invite %1 to your gang, if they accept the invite they will have access to the gang's funds.
Key.English: You are about to invite %1 to your gang, if they accept the invite they will have access to the gang's funds.
Key.German: Du bist dabei, %1 in deine Gang einzuladen. Wenn die Einladung angenommen wird, hat der Spieler Zugang zu den Mitteln der Gang.
Key.French: Vous êtes sur le point d'inviter %1 à votre gang, s'ils acceptent l'invitation, ils auront accès à des fonds du gang.
Key.Italian: Stai per invitare %1 nella tua Gang, se accetterà l'invito avrà accesso ai fondi della Gang.
Key.Portuguese: Você vai convidar %1 para a gangue, ele terá acesso aos recursos da gangue.

Key.Original: You need to select a person to invite!
Key.English: You need to select a person to invite!
Key.German: Du musst einen Spieler zum Einladen auswählen!
Key.French: Vous devez sélectionner une personne à inviter!
Key.Italian: Devi selezionare una persona da invitare!
Key.Portuguese: Você tem que selecionar um jogador para convidar!

Key.Original: You have sent a invite to your gang to %1
Key.English: You have sent a invite to your gang to %1
Key.German: Du hast eine Einladung in deine Gang an %1 gesendet
Key.French: Vous avez envoyé une invitation à votre gang à %1
Key.Italian: Hai mandato l'invito alla tua Gang a %1
Key.Portuguese: Você enviou um convite para %1 se juntar a sua gangue

Key.English: Invitation Cancelled
Key.German: Einladung abgebrochen
Key.French: Invitation Annulées
Key.Italian: Invito Annullato
Key.Portuguese: Convite Cancelado

Key.English: You cannot kick yourself!
Key.German: Du kannst dich nicht selbst kicken!
Key.French: Vous ne pouvez pas kicker vous-même!
Key.Italian: Non puoi espellerti da solo!
Key.Portuguese: Você não pode kickar você mesmo!

Key.Original: Your gang has reached its maximum allowed slots, please upgrade your gangs slot limit.
Key.English: Your gang has reached its maximum allowed slots, please upgrade your gangs slot limit.
Key.German: Deine Gang hat die maximale Anzahl an Plätzen erreicht, bitte erhöhe das Limit deiner Gang.
Key.French: Votre gang à atteint le nombre de membre maximum, veuillez augmenter cette limite.
Key.Italian: la tua Gang ha raggiungo il numero massimo di posti consentiti, aumentane il limite.
Key.Portuguese: Sua gangue está lotada, você deve aumentar o número máximo de jogadores.

Key.Original: You need to select a person to kick!
Key.English: You need to select a person to kick!
Key.German: Du musst einen Spieler auswählen, um ihn kicken zu können!
Key.French: Vous devez choisir une personne pour le kick!
Key.Italian: Devi selezionare una persona da espellere!
Key.Portuguese: Você tem que selecionar um jogador para kickar!

Key.Original: You cannot leave the gang without appointing a new leader first!
Key.English: You cannot leave the gang without appointing a new leader first
Key.German: Du kannst die Gang nicht verlassen, ohne einen neuen Anführer zu ernennen!
Key.French: Vous ne pouvez pas quitter le gang sans la nomination d'un nouveau chef d'abord!
Key.Italian: Non puoi abbandonare la Gang prima di aver selezionato un nuovo Capo!
Key.Portuguese: Você não pode sair da gangue sem transferir a liderança antes!

Key.Original:
You are about to transfer leadership over to %1
By transferring leadership you will no longer be in control of the gang unless ownership is transferred back.
Key.English:
You are about to transfer leadership over to %1
By transferring leadership you will no longer be in control of the gang unless ownership is transferred back.
Key.German:
Du bist dabei, die Führung an %1 zu übertragen
Durch die Übertragung der Leitung der Gang hast du keine Kontrolle mehr.
Key.French:
Vous allez transférer le commandement à %1
En transférant le commandement, vous ne serez plus le chef du gang, sauf si le commandement est transféré de nouveau.
Key.Italian:
Stai per traferire il comando a %1
Facendolo non avrai più il controllo della Gang fino a quando non ti verrà restituito il comando.
Key.Portuguese:
Você vai transferir a liderança da gangue para %1
Você não será mais o lider da gangue.

Key.English: Transfer of leadership cancelled.
Key.German: Übertragung der Leitung abgebrochen.
Key.French: Transfert du commandement annulée.
Key.Italian: Trasferimento del comando annullato.
Key.Portuguese: Transferencia de liderança cancelada.

Key.English: You are already the leader!
Key.German: Du bist bereits der Anführer!
Key.French: Vous êtes déjà leader!
Key.Italian: Sei già il Capo!
Key.Portuguese: Você já está na liderança!

Key.Original: You need to select a person first!
Key.English: You need to select a person first!
Key.German: Du musst erst eine Person auswählen!
Key.French: Vous devez choisir une personne d'abord!
Key.Italian: Devi selezionare una persona!
Key.Portuguese: Você tem que selecionar um jogador antes!

Key.Original: You are about to upgrade the maximum members allowed for your gang.
Key.English: You are about to upgrade the maximum members allowed for your gang.
Key.German: Du bist dabei, die maximale Anzahl an Mitgliedern zu erhöhen.
Key.French: Vous êtes sur le point de mettre à niveau la limite de membre autorisées pour votre gang.
Key.Italian: Stai aumentando il numero massimo di membri consentiti all'interno della tua Gang
Key.Portuguese: Você vai atualizar o limite de membros da gangue.

Key.English: Current Max: %1
Key.German: Aktuelles Maximum: %1
Key.French: Max actuelle: %1
Key.Italian: Attuali Max: %1
Key.Portuguese: Número máximo atual: %1

Key.English: Upgraded Max: %2
Key.German: Maximum erhöhen: %2
Key.French: Mise à niveau Max: %2
Key.Italian: Aumento Max: %2
Key.Portuguese: Novo número máximo: %2

Key.English: Price:
Key.German: Preis:
Key.French: Prix:
Key.Italian: Costo:
Key.Portuguese: Preço:

Key.Original: You do not have enough money in your bank account to upgrade the gangs maximum member limit.
Key.English: You do not have enough money in your bank account to upgrade the gangs maximum member limit.
Key.German: Du hast nicht genug Geld auf deinem Bankkonto, um das Mitgliederlimit deiner Gang zu erhöhen.
Key.French: Vous n'avez pas assez d'argent dans votre compte de banque pour mettre à niveau la limite de membre maximale.
Key.Italian: Non hai abbastanza fondi nel tuo conto in banca per aumentare il limite massimo di membri.
Key.Portuguese: Você não dinheiro suficiente para para aumentar o limite da gangue.

Key.English: Current:
Key.German: Aktuell:
Key.French: Actuel:
Key.Italian: Attuale:
Key.Portuguese: Atual:

Key.English: Lacking:
Key.German: Fehlend:
Key.French: Manquant:
Key.Italian: Mancanza:
Key.Portuguese: Faltando:

Key.Original: You have upgraded from %1 to %2 maximum slots for <t color='#8cff9b'>$%3</t>
Key.English: You have upgraded from %1 to %2 maximum slots for <t color='#8cff9b'>$%3</t>
Key.German: Du hast für <t color='#8cff9b'>$%3</t> von %1 auf %2 Plätze erhöht
Key.French: Vous avez mis à niveau à partir de %1 à %2 membres maximum for <t color='#8cff9b'>$%3</t>
Key.Italian: Hai aumentato i posti massimi da %1 a %2 per <t color='#8cff9b'>€%3</t>
Key.Portuguese: Limite de membros atualizado de %1 para %2 por <t color='#8cff9b'>R$%3</t>

Key.English: Upgrade cancelled.
Key.German: Aufwertung abgebrochen.
Key.French: Mise à jour annulée.
Key.Italian: Aumento annullato.
Key.Portuguese: Cancelar Upgrade.

Key.English: Funds:
Key.German: Geld:
Key.French: Fonds:
Key.Italian: Fondi
Key.Portuguese: Recursos:

Key.English: (Gang Leader)
Key.German: (Anführer)
Key.French: (Gang Leader)
Key.Italian: (Capo Gang)
Key.Portuguese: (Lider da Gangue)

Key.Original: You failed to deliver the package because you died.
Die Behandlung kostet dich $%1. Komm wieder wenn du das Geld hast.
Hau doch nicht ab. So lange Arme hab ich nicht.
%1, dein %2 wird von der Polizei beschlagnahmt.
Du hast einen %1 beschlagnahmt.\n\nDu hast $%2 für die Beschlagnahme erhalten!
Hier gibt es nichts zum farmen.
You cannot turn the vehicle on when mining
Der Gerät is jetzt krass am farmen...
Der Gerät schwitzt nicht. Und wieder %1 mehr.
The robbery has failed due to unknown reasons
$%1 was stolen from the robbery on the federal reserve
This vault is already being robbed by someone else
This vault was already robbed recently
